job description:
Job Description
Data Analyst

Job Responsibilities

Data analysis and reporting for supplier performance, new orders, commitments of parts, overdue parts, and turnbacks.

Gather and maintain data. Pull raw data and convert it into a presentable, usable format.

Update daily, weekly and monthly reports by gathering data, and analyzing meaning of the data. Reports are typically in MS Powerpoint.

Participate in data audits

Requirements

A.S degree in business or technical field

2+ years-experience in data analytics

Skilled in MS Excel

Skilled in MS Powerpoint

As the job is in an engineering environment, some exposure or interest in the engineering field preferred

Experience in supply chain a plus

SAP experience a plus
Company Description
QuEST is driven by the unlimited potential of engineering to bring new possibilities, new experiences, and even new hope into the homes, communities, and daily lives of the people around us.

We help pioneer the future of flights that are safer, faster, and reliable by streamlining engineering and manufacturing processes and innovating efficiencies that help our clients lead the way in the marketplace.

We are leaving cleaner air in our wake by partnering with manufacturers to design and introduce the next generation of greener, super-efficient Aero Engines.

We are advancing technologies that help make self-driving cars reliable and affordable.

We help oil producers find the competitive edge they need to sustain success in the digital oil fields with asset-optimization. We are innovating ways to make renewable energy affordable and the world around us more liveable.

We are advancing the surveillance and data technologies to pioneer new ideas that provide expertise on-site and on-the-job worldwide.

We partner with the world’s leading medical device manufacturers to improve outcomes by accelerating innovations that empower doctors with the timely advantage.

We are a global team of passionate engineers engaging with leading, innovation-driven Fortune 500 brands.

“What’s next?” That’s the question we ask ourselves every day.

WHAT’S THE NEXT CHALLENGE, THE NEXT INNOVATION, THE NEXT TRANSFORMATIONAL IDEA THAT WILL ADVANCE AND IMPROVE THE HUMAN CONDITION — AND ABOVE ALL, WHAT CAN WE DO TO HELP DRIVE IT?

This is the mindset that motivates everything we do for the indispensable companies we count as our partners. Every day, we’re helping these companies realize their vision to elevate the ways people live, work, travel, relax, and engage with each other and world at large. And we welcome the opportunity to do the same for you.

CREATE THE FRONTIER.
